means: 缺乏安慰的，不舒服的，不自由的

sentence.Network_en: He shows the human situation, however glassy its superficial look, to be comfortless.
sentence.Network_cn: 他显示人类的处境表面尽管光润, 其实复杂而乏味.

sentence.Network_en: She was lying in a bed in a poor little room, bare and comfortless.
sentence.Network_cn: 她躺在一间简陋的小屋子里的病榻上,屋内四壁空徒,很不舒适.

sentence.Network_en: He escape from a disorderly, comfortless home into a wealthy, respectable one.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从一个混乱而无安慰的家庭逃到一个富有而又受人尊敬的家庭.

PerfectNetExp.abs: comforter 慰问者comfortless 不舒服的comfortlessly 不舒服地
discomfortable:不适的，不舒服的comfortless：缺乏安慰的、不舒适的45． compel 基本含义及用法
He escaped from a disorderly , comfortless home into a wealthy , respectable one ., 他从一个混乱而无安慰的家庭逃到一个富有而又受人尊敬的家庭.
she felt comfortless in the big chair ., 她坐在大椅子上感觉很不舒服.

list.abs: Maomao , the advent of you brought too much comfortless and happiness to me !, 你的到来带给了我太多的安慰和快乐!
she felt comfortless in the big chair ., 她坐在大椅子上感觉很不舒服.
You will escape from a disorderly , comfortless home into a wealthy , respectable one ., 你将从一个乱糟糟的 , 不舒服的家庭逃脱 , 走进一个富裕的体面人家.
they brought comfortless news to all of us ., 他们给我们带来的消息没有安慰我们.

means.word_mean: 令人不快的,郁郁不乐的
